name: interdepartmentally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves the different departments of a school, university, business, etc.: They set up a body to review policies interdepartmentally. We all work together as a team and pool our resources interdepartmentally. Related word
interdepartmental
More examplesFewer examplesIf we are to achieve anything, it is essential for the government to work interdepartmentally.When it is necessary, coordination is achieved interdepartmentally.The ministry was informed that the prime minister was not disposed to accept the arrangements agreed upon interdepartmentally regarding the tour.Taking new initiatives inter-departmentally will ensure we keep up with emerging issues and policies.
